title: Annual Statement Review Checklist
description: This checklist is her to make the preparation of the annual statement. Use it to ensure all tasks are reviewed and completed before starting the annual statement

prepareInvoices.title: Prepare all invoices for the accounting period.

reviewCleaningCosts.title: Review building cleaning and caretaker costs.

documentWasteCosts.title: Document costs for waste disposal and street cleaning.

verifyLivingAreas.title: Verify proportional living areas and usage units.

collectReceipts.title: Collect all invoices and receipts for the accounting year.
